details.PBDescription: Global Credit Risk Management (CRM) is an independent risk oversight function, reporting directlyinto the Global Chief Risk Officer (CRO). Nomura Overview:âNomura is an Asia-headquartered financial services group with an integrated global networkspanning over 30 countries. By âConnecting Markets East & Westâ, Nomura services the needsof individuals, institutions, corporates and governments through its three business divisions:Retail, Asset Management, and Wholesale (Global Markets and Investment Banking). Foundedin 1925, the firm is built on a tradition of disciplined entrepreneurship, serving clients withcreative solutions and considered thought leadership.Divisional Overview:The Risk Management Division encompasses the firm's comprehensive risk frameworkresponsible for determining and managing the overall risk appetite for the firm. The division isresponsible for effectively managing the firm's risk-return profile which ensures the efficientdeployment of the firm's capital. It is one of the firm's core competencies and is independent ofthe trading areas and operational areas.Business Unit Overview:Risk Methodology Group develops the quantitative methodologies used to measurecounterparty credit /market risk; provides analyses and consultation on risk quantification,participates in global efforts on modelling risk exposure.Work on various regulatory requirements including Back testing, Stress Testing, Model reviews,Calibration, User Acceptance Testing, Documentation of modelsDuties & Responsibilities:- Work on certain Machine learning techniques for risk data visualization and risk modeloptimization.- Assist in creating what-if tools for Risk/Regulatory models.- Create Python based tools for Risk Model not covered by the systems. Good Communications Skillsâ¢ Good Programming KnowledgeStrong interest in finance and economics2. Strong programming skills, especially, hands-on experience with Python, R, MATLABor C++ (very strong in at least one language)3. Basic coursework on Probability theory and Statistics4. Basic coursework on Econometrics and time series analysis

details.projectTitle: Global Risk â Financing Risk Intern
details.PBDescription: Company overviewNomura is a leading financial services group and the preeminent Asian-based investment bank withworldwide reach. Nomura provides a broad range of innovative solutions tailored to the specificrequirements of individual, institutional, corporate and government clients through an international networkin over 30 countries. Based in Tokyo and with regional headquarters in Hong Kong, London, and New York,Nomura employs over 26,000 staff worldwide. Nomuraâs unique understanding of Asia enables thecompany to make a difference for clients through three business divisions: retail, asset management, andwholesale (global markets and investment banking). For further information about Nomura, please visitwww.nomura.comDepartment overview:The Financing Risk team is responsible for the risk managing of the firmâs second order credit risks acrossall product lines in a manner that is both risk sensitive and commercially viable. The role of the FinancingRisk team is to facilitate and risk manage collateralised transaction across Nomuraâs business lines.Role description:? Enhance business process within PS Risk, from streamlining report generating process,database management and develop analytical tools.? Monitor and analyse client portfolios in terms of exposure, risk profile and margin level.? Automate different reports, risk management tool and other processes wherever possible tofocus on risk management and increase the efficiency.Skills, experience, qualifications and knowledge required:? PC skills with advanced competency in Microsoft Excel, Macros, VBA, Access database, andSQL are preferred.? Analytically inclined. Candidates should have basic understanding of Risk Management? Comfortable in any one computer language like Ipython, C++, R or Matlab? Computer Science (preferably having done electives in Economics and Finance)? Self-motivated and ability to multi-task under pressure and meet various deadlines.A strong desire to learn the process as a basis for development of risk management skills within a globalinvestment bank is a key attribute for any candidatePlease contact us if you are visiting our offices and require any form of personal assistance or physicaladaptations to be provided for your appointment.

Purpose: Market Risk Management:? Market Risk Management works to identify, monitor and control the firmâs exposure to risk, analyze stress test results, and provideanalysis on new products and businesses.? Market Risk managers liaise with the risk managers and traders in the trading centers to help manage their market exposure, set &review risk strategies.? Major activities involve daily analysis and interpretation of the results of risk sensitivities, validation of risk parameters and drill downanalysis of less transparent risks and issues of importance to senior Risk Management/Trading HeadsResponsibilities: Market Risk Management? Risk reporting and aggregation and delivering these reports to traders and Front Office senior management. Trouble-shoot and reengineer the risk reporting process where necessary.? Day-to-day administration of market risk measurement and limit framework. This includes monitoring usage against limits andmanaging breaches/escalation.? Daily analysis and interpretation of the results of risk sensitivities across various trading strategies.? Liaising with the regional risk managers and front office on various market risk issues and ad-hoc analysis work.? Monitor & understand the external market. Monitor the P&L and tie-up P&L with risk.? Providing market intelligence and risk analysis to regional and global executive management, CEOs and regional and legal entityboards and committees.? Providing independent market risk advice to the front office, senior management and other stakeholders.? Assessment/approval of new products and new business from a Market Risk point of view.: Stress Testing? Stress testing primary purpose is to ensure that all material risk concentrations are understood and consistent with the Firmâs riskappetite and business strategy.? Stress testing is carried out on a regular basis to ensure that the Firm has sufficient resources to continue to do business in the eventof a severe downturn scenario beyond the reach of VaR/NCAT.? Stress testing scenarios are designed to provide a forward-looking assessment of the risks taken by the Firm.Responsibilities: Stress TestingThe stress testing analyst is responsible for the following functions either directly or through the stress testing team or Risk IT:? Analysis and review of scenario results, focusing on understanding behavior of derivative products under scenario conditions.? Production of stress testing reporting information for distribution to senior management and regulators.? Continuous review of existing control environment and processes in order to improve controls and efficiency of process.? Implementing improvements to stress testing reporting information and developing new stress tests in order to provide effective keyrisk management information to senior management.? Working with front office and other risk managers to review current portfolio risks and trading strategies in order to develop newscenarios / improve current scenarios to fully address market risks.? Overall consolidation Reporting: monthly / quarterly to senior management and regulators.? Contribute in the design and specification of functional improvements to strategic and tactical IT applications used for stress testing.? Satisfy the regulatorâs scenario requests and other infrastructure and control requirements.

Comfortable in any one computer language like Ipython, C++, R or Matlab? Self-motivated and ability to multi-task under pressure and meet various deadlines.A strong desire to learn the process as a basis for development of risk management skills within a globalinvestment bank is a key attribute for any candidatePlease contact us if you are visiting our offices and require any form of personal assistance or physicaladaptations to be provided for your appointment.

details.PBDescription: Business Overview:Risk Management in Nomura globally, works as a partner to business. Risk management teams arepresent in all the regions and are organized broadly by the Risk type â Market, Credit, and Operational.The Risk Management set up in Powai (Mumbai), is a global hub for Risk Management functions. Anumber of strategic initiatives are also delivered by Powai.Risk Data Management and Control (RDMC) is a function within Risk Management that is responsible forData Management and Control. Whilst input data is validated reported data is reconciled. RDMC ensuresthat relationships between a plethora of reference data and transaction data are not broken. In additionthey assist Risk Managers (RM) in resolving data issues where necessary and take corrective actions.Additionally the RDMC function reconciles reports between systems to ensure that numbers from multiplesystems are consistent. RDMC also drives data management strategy for Risk and helps develop dataarchitectures that are flexible and meets new regulatory requirements.Roles and Responsibilities:? Analysis of input data necessary for risk metrics valuation.? Building tools for detecting input data issues and define processes for resolving them.? Identify processes that can be automated using RPA (Robotic Process Automation).? Looks FinTech opportunities and build tools to improve process efficiencies? Connect and coordinate with risk managers across all regions to support ad hoc requirements? Help achieve operational efficiencies through process re-engineering and automationKey learnings:? Financial instruments and Sensitivities (Greeks)? Risk management and Regulatory developments? Understand how various types of data used for Risk Management.? Hands-on experience on programming languages such as Excel Macros, Python and databaseprogramming etc
details.elective: FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT(-) , FINANCIAL RISK ANAL AND MGMT(-) , FUNDA OF FIN AND ACCOUNT(-) , SECUR ANAL & PORTFOL MGT(-)

details.PBDescription: Job Description Historical Market Data Analyst (Internship)Business OverviewThe Historical Market Data (HMD) Group in Powai is a significant part of global HMD within the RiskMethodology Group of the bank. HMD is responsible for the maintenance of the historical market dataused in the strategic risk systems - both market risk and credit risk.The team is responsible for all operational activities related to maintaining historical data for differentcategories of time series as well as the mapping to the various risk sensitivities. The team coordinateswith risk managers and middle-office teams globally as well as the wider risk methodology group.HMD Powai is involved in several global strategic projects including requirements arising out of BCBS239 (Risk Data Aggregation) and BCBS 265 (Fundamental Review of the Trading Book). Further, thegroup is also leading multiple efficiency and control initiatives by way of automation, processimprovements and driving IT enhancements.Roles and Responsibilities? Diligently source and maintain historical market data for VaR / Stressed-VaR / expected shortfalland other risk models.? Update VaR window and analyze change in VaR due to market data changes? Review optimal window for Stressed-VaR and analyze impact of change in optimal window? Provide impact analyses around changes in time series data including review of various inputparameters? Set criteria and identify appropriate proxy for time series data? Build expertise around market data for one / more asset classes (Equity, Rates, Credit, FX,Commodities, Securitized Products. etc.) to undertake ad hoc analyses? Connect and coordinate with risk managers and market risk middle office across all regions tosupport ad hoc requirements? Help achieve operational efficiencies through process re-engineering and automationKey learnings? Risk management, risk sensitivities (Greeks) and financial derivatives.? Regulatory developments? Exposure to Bloomberg and other market data vendors? Hands-on experience on programming languages such as Matlab, Python, R etc.

details.PBDescription: Purpose: Stress Testing?Stress testing primary purpose is to ensure that all material risk concentrations are understood and consistent with the Firmâs riskappetite and business strategy.?Stress testing is carried out on a regular basis to ensure that the Firm has sufficient resources to continue to do business in the eventof a severe downturn scenario beyond the reach of VaR/NCAT.?Stress testing scenarios are designed to provide a forward-looking assessment of the risks taken by the Firm.Responsibilities: Stress TestingThe stress testing analyst is responsible for the following functions either directly or through the stress testing team or Risk IT:?Analysis and review of scenario results, focusing on understanding behavior of derivative products under scenario conditions.?Production of stress testing reporting information for distribution to senior management and regulators.?Continuous review of existing control environment and processes in order to improve controls and efficiency of process.?Implementing improvements to stress testing reporting information and developing new stress tests in order to provide effective keyrisk management information to senior management.?Working with front office and other risk managers to review current portfolio risks and trading strategies in order to develop newscenarios / improve current scenarios to fully address market risks.?Overall consolidation Reporting: monthly / quarterly to senior management and regulators.?Contribute in the design and specification of functional improvements to strategic and tactical IT applications used for stress testing.?Satisfy the regulatorâs scenario requests and other infrastructure and control requirements.

details.PBDescription: Risk Data Management and Control (RDMC) is a function within Risk Management that is responsible forData Management and Control. Whilst input data is validated reported data is reconciled. RDMC ensuresthat relationships between a plethora of reference data and transaction data are not broken. In additionthey assist Risk Managers (RM) in resolving data issues where necessary and take corrective actions.Additionally the RDMC function reconciles reports between systems to ensure that numbers from multiplesystems are consistent. RDMC also drives data management strategy for Risk and helps develop dataarchitectures that are flexible and meets new regulatory requirements.Roles and Responsibilities:? Analysis of input data necessary for risk metrics valuation.? Building tools for detecting input data issues and define processes for resolving them.? Identify processes that can be automated using RPA (Robotic Process Automation).? Looks FinTech opportunities and build tools to improve process efficiencies? Connect and coordinate with risk managers across all regions to support ad hoc requirements? Help achieve operational efficiencies through process re-engineering and automation.

details.PBDescription: The team is responsible for all operational activities related to maintaining historical data for differentcategories of time series as well as the mapping to the various risk sensitivities. Diligently source and maintain historical market data for VaR / Stressed-VaR / expected shortfalland other risk models.? Update VaR window and analyze change in VaR due to market data changes? Set criteria and identify appropriate proxy for time series data? Build expertise around market data for one / more asset classes (Equity, Rates, Credit, FX,Commodities, Securitized Products. etc.) to undertake ad hoc analyses? Purpose: Market Risk Management:? Market Risk Management works to identify, monitor and control the firmâs exposure to risk, analyze stress test results, and provide analysis on new products and businesses.? Market Risk managers liaise with the risk managers and traders in the trading centers to help manage their market exposure, set & review risk strategies.? Major activities involve daily analysis and interpretation of the results of risk sensitivities, validation of risk parameters and drill down analysis of less transparent risks and issues of importance to senior Risk Management/Trading HeadsResponsibilities: Market Risk Management? Risk reporting and aggregation and delivering these reports to traders and Front Office senior management. Trouble-shoot and reengineer the risk reporting process where necessary.? Day-to-day administration of market risk measurement and limit framework. This includes monitoring usage against limits and managing breaches/escalation.? Daily analysis and interpretation of the results of risk sensitivities across various trading strategies.? Liaising with the regional risk managers and front office on various market risk issues and ad-hoc analysis work.? Monitor & understand the external market. Monitor the P&L and tie-up P&L with risk.? Providing market intelligence and risk analysis to regional and global executive management, CEOs and regional and legal entityboards and committees.? Providing independent market risk advice to the front office, senior management and other stakeholders.? Assessment/approval of new products and new business from a Market Risk point of view.

details.PBDescription: (a) Project description in terms of broad phases: Nutanix is the fastest growing software infrastructure startup in the last decade and weâre expanding our team of world-class programmers to architect, design, test, and implement our super-scalable compute and storage infrastructure for enterprise-class virtualization. Nutanix is able to provide Google-like distributed data center technology to the masses; bringing the public to the private cloud. Nutanix is building the software-defined computing platform for next generation data centers that will be scale-out, flash-enabled, and converged. Data centers of the future will run on commodity x86 servers, with most services being virtual (software-defined). Weâre building a distributed system that collapses compute and storage into a single tier of machines, and our vision is to fuse the public with private clouds; seamlessly. We aim to enhance special-purpose storage appliances that sit multiple hops away from a general-purpose compute, just like Hadoop did for big data workloads. The exact project will be decided after interacting with the students depending on their interest and skills.

As part of this assignment the intern will get a chance to learn about computer architecture at a very granular level, System Verilog, Design Verification, SOC Verification, Verification methodologies and C/C++ programming. During the course of the internship, the intern will contribute to building test benches, developing architectural simulators, modifying random instruction generators and creating stimulus for verification and validation of different units of the CPU and SOC. details.PBDescription: (a) Project 1:  Conceptualize and implement a cross platform embedded software development tools environment for use of content developers who create Pachinko entertainment games on Windows host platform. Developed embedded software content should however be capable of download/deployment onto Linux based targets. This environment will be created by leveraging the Virtual Box environment and Eclipse IDE.(b) Project 2:Implement a virtualized audio driver on Tegra SOC so as to enable seamless sharing of all audio resources across multiple heterogeneous OS partitions running under a hypervisor on Tegra SOC. List of heterogeneous embedded OS platforms to be supported includes Linux, Android, QNX and Integrity from Greenhills.(c) Project 3:Develop and deploy a reusable and configurable unit test infrastructure for execution of automated unit test cases which can help validate all the high complexity multicore Linux kernel features and device drivers for a wide range of automotive industry specific I/O peripherals (CAN, Ethernet AVB etc.) across a range of Tegra SOC platforms. (d) Project 4:Design, development, integration and validation of an echo cancellation reference framework for use within Apple's Carplay framework. Developed solution will need to be integrated for running across multiple embedded OS platforms including Linux, QNX and Integrity from Greenhills.(e) Project 5:Design and implementation of a validation framework for automated validation of audio and capture device drivers running on the QNX embedded RTOS. Further the framework will need to be integrated into automated build and test flow in order to support the continuous integration process on all the active QNX projects.

details.projectTitle: IMP (Is Mode Possible) regression test suite
details.PBDescription: IMP checks the whether the mode (resolution like 800x600 60 Hz) is possible on particular display panel and GPU display hardware.  IMP involves complex calculations to check available bandwidth of display frame buffer and possible timing calculations of both display panel and display hardware.Motive of this project is to verify IMP algorithm across all marketing mode timings, this is done by simulating display panel and picking up a mode from list of available modes and apply them to light up display panel.  We have available test suite which works with both Linux and Windows, Because of more involved maintenance stuff we want to slash some of the unused support and re-architect the tool to make it easily launchable application, Which can work across both windows and Linux.
details.SKills: C , C coding , C++ , Compilers/File Systems , Visual studio , Windows

details.PBDescription: A key part of NVIDIAâs strength is our unique tools for analysis, visualization, debug and automated regressions.   We are looking for bright engineers to participate in our fast-paced Agile software team and to continue and improve our extremely high production quality standards.  These tools are used by all the engineers in NVIDIA.We are continuously pushing the envelope and needing the next generation of tools to enable the next generation of chips.  The tools we build involve high compute infrastructure to allow very large scale distributed, cross-platform runs of mission critical proprietary applications,  creating integrated development and debugging environments (such as Eclipse),  implementing software engineering methodologies and tools to improve code quality,  creating and driving quality build and release processes, and driving the performance improvement of chips we develop Areas you will be working on- object-oriented programming and design background: Object Oriented Perl, C++ or Java preferred - interpreted language skills â Object Oriented Perl preferred- Experience in software development life cycle in Linux based platforms preferred

details.PBDescription: We design, implement, optimize and support high quality software for NVIDIA's industry-leading Application Processors used in automotive applications. NVIDIA automotive software group writes code for high end ARM processors, running Linux, QNX, and other embedded OS. Our products span multiple technology areas on these platforms, including:â¢        Understanding Kernel device drivers, embedded virtualization, development toolchains, debug toolsâ¢        Knowledge of 3D/2D Graphics drivers, graphics resource management, middleware and applicationsâ¢        Multimedia frameworks, codecs and signal processing algorithmsâ¢        Android platforms for AutomotiveFamiliarity with any of the Operating systems - Linux / QNX and other embedded OS'sâ¢        NVIDIA hardware validation in production flow  We are looking for New College Graduates who are passionate about working at the intersection of leading edge graphics, multimedia and operating system software. Looking for interns who will be working in the following areas:â¢        Principles of hardware operation: CPU and memory architecture, buses and interconnectsâ¢        Operating System fundamentals: multi-processing and scheduling, memory management, privilege modes, file systems and device driversâ¢        Algorithms and data structuresâ¢        Principles of parallel computingâ¢        C and/or C++ programming languagesâ¢        UNIX shell scripting language We have positions open with each of these teams in the Automotive team1.        [System Software]: Linux drivers, bootloaders, and embedded virtualization2.        [Graphics Software]: OpenGL-ES and CUDA based graphics applications on Linux and Android3.        [Graphics/Video Resource Manager]: Resource Manager team is responsible for design and development of the driver stack that controls NVIDIA's GPU and Display hardware, the heart of our discrete and SOC devices. Candidate will work on user space and kernel space software controlling and arbitrating access to complex and sophisticated hardware that does graphics rendering, multimedia encoding and decoding, parallel computation, bus control, and surface/buffer management.4.        [Multimedia]: Video and audio playback and encoding frameworks on Android/Linux/QNX, Linux audio drivers, video capture frameworks on Android/Linux5.        [Android Frameworks]: Development and/or optimization of Android services, applications and Android framework components for Automotive infotainment systemsSkillset required: OS/Linux/C++/C/DATA STRUCTURES

Our products span multiple technology areas on these platforms, including:â¢        Kernel device drivers, embedded virtualization, development toolchains, debug toolsâ¢        3D/2D Graphics drivers, graphics resource management, middleware and applicationsâ¢        Multimedia frameworks, codecs and signal processing algorithmsâ¢        Android platforms for Automotiveâ¢        NVIDIA hardware validation in production flow We are looking for New College Graduates who are passionate about working at the intersection of leading edge graphics, multimedia and operating system software. Looking for interns who will be working in the following areas:â¢        Principles of hardware operation: CPU and memory architecture, buses and interconnectsâ¢        Operating System fundamentals: multi-processing and scheduling, memory management, privilege modes, file systems and device driversâ¢        Algorithms and data structuresâ¢        Principles of parallel computingâ¢        C and/or C++ programming languagesâ¢        UNIX shell scripting language We have positions open with each of these teams in the Automotive team1.        [System Software]: Linux drivers, bootloaders, and embedded virtualization2.        [Graphics Software]: OpenGL-ES and CUDA based graphics applications on Linux and Android3.        [Graphics/Video Resource Manager]: Resource Manager team is responsible for design and development of the driver stack that controls NVIDIA's GPU and Display hardware, the heart of our discrete and SOC devices. Candidate will work on user space and kernel space software controlling and arbitrating access to complex and sophisticated hardware that does graphics rendering, multimedia encoding and decoding, parallel computation, bus control, and surface/buffer management.4.        [Multimedia]: Video and audio playback and encoding frameworks on Android/Linux/QNX, Linux audio drivers, video capture frameworks on Android/Linux5.        [Android Frameworks]: Development and/or optimization of Android services, applications and Android framework components for Automotive infotainment systems

details.PBDescription: A key part of NVIDIAâs strength is our unique tools for analysis, visualization, debug and automated regressions.   We are looking for bright engineers to participate in our fast-paced Agile software team and to continue and improve our extremely high production quality standards.  These tools are used by all the engineers in NVIDIA.We are continuously pushing the envelope and needing the next generation of tools to enable the next generation of chips.  The tools we build involve high compute infrastructure to allow very large scale distributed, cross-platform runs of mission critical proprietary applications,  creating integrated development and debugging environments (such as Eclipse),  implementing software engineering methodologies and tools to improve code quality,  creating and driving quality build and release processes, and driving the performance improvement of chips we develop Areas you will be working on- object-oriented programming and design background: Object Oriented Perl, C++ or Java preferred - interpreted language skills â Object Oriented Perl preferred- Experience in software development life cycle in Linux based platforms preferred- BE/BS/B.Tech/ME/MTech in Computer Science/EE. - Excellent communication skills- Flexibility/adaptability for working in a dynamic environment with different frameworks and requirements

OfBusiness is on the mission to bring a change, by leveraging Technology, in the way SMEs in India transact with one another.  In our quest, OfBsiness is building Indiaâs most trusted SME network, serving all that they care for: credit, commerce (material supply) and logistics. .As part of the internship, the candidate will be working on the core technology platform (backend, app and web) which enables commerce and credit transactions e.g. Bidding engine, Credit Underwriting, Loan Management System. Oracle Fusion Applications is the newest product suite in the Oracle Applications portfolio. It is the only Oracle Applications offering available to customers both on premises and in the cloud. Oracle Fusion Applications were designed, from the ground up using the latest technology advances and incorporating the best practices gathered from Oracle's thousands of customers and is core part of the Software as a Service (SaaS) public cloud solution that Oracle offers. They are 100 percent open-standards-based business applications that set a new standard for the way we innovate, work, and adopt technology. These best-of-breed SaaS applications in Oracle Cloud are integrated with social, mobile, and analytic capabilities to help deliver the experience customers expects and the performance the market demands. Oracle Fusion Applications includes over 100 modules across the following core enterprise application product domainsâ¢	Customer Experience (CX) â Oracle offers the most complete customer experience portfolio solution to meet customer experience initiative, large or small and built around best-in-class marketing, commerce, sales, service, and social solutions â¢	Human Capital Management (HCM) â Oracle offers breadth and depth of a global Human Resource (HR) end-to-end solution covering core HR, talent management, workforce management, workforce rewards as well as workforce optimization and workforce analytics.â¢	Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) â Oracle offers the most comprehensive integrated and scalable for streamlining your enterprise business processes with Financials, Procurement, Project Portfolio Management and more, which help customers increase productivity, lower costs, and improve controls.â¢	Supply Chain Management (SCM) â Oracle Offers SCM enabling companies to rapidly deploy supply chain management functionality integrating and automating all key supply chain & manufacturing  processes, from design, planning, and procurement to manufacturing and order fulfillment.â¢	Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) - Oracleâs market-leading EPM applications combined with the innovation and simplicity of the cloud, enable companies of any size to drive predictable performance, report with confidence, and connect the entire organization.As part of the team developing business applications Software as a Service (SaaS) for the Cloud, we innovate and make significant contributions to strategic Cloud development at Oracle. We design and build solutions for solving complex business problems with the use of cutting-edge technology and  working collaboratively with teams across the globe. The basic skills required can be summarized as:-â¢	Good programming skills, preferably in Java â¢	Good Analytical & Problem Solving skillsâ¢	Proficiency with data structures and algorithmsâ¢	Knowledge of software engineering principles & best practicesâ¢	Knowledge of REST/SOAP webservices

details.projectTitle: Implementation of Shared table scans & Cache Buffers
details.PBDescription: Oracle Analytics would like to build out the next generation of query processing framework. As part of that framework we would like run a project / POC to use Cache buffers with LRUs that would maintain an in memory cache of extract files to avoid Disk I/O. The framework to determine, persist ensuring a massively parallel multi-threaded architecture would be key to the success of this project. Logical delivery would be to understand the existing code base and put together a low level design. Next phase would be to implement the solution and final stage would be to performance benchmark the solution

details.projectTitle: Oracle Access Manager Integration for Mobile Push Notification support
details.PBDescription: The requirement is to write an Custom Authentication Plugin for 12cPS3 OAM Server to support push notification support with Android and iOS devices, with Oracle Mobile Authenticator as the app

details.projectTitle: Development of RESTFul Infrastructure for Clusterware Events
details.PBDescription: &Double;At a high level, the intern will be tasked with developing a REST web service interface for our existing event publication/subscription API, to be included in the core product for both internal teams and external customers to use.The majority of Oracle Clusterware is built in C/C++ code, and this includes our event sub-system. Our events are used for timely notification of outages (including an SLA of 250ms) and changes of state, and are consumed by both internal teams and, via wrappers, customer code. A large barrier to entry for clients wishing to consume our events is the requirement of using C to interface with it. Clients must figure out how to properly link their binaries with our library, and in the case of Java, must use JNIs. The internal Enterprise Manager team, which codes mainly in Java, has asked for a way to asynchronously receive events, so they can combine and display data about thousands of nodes, with many databases, services, and applications. By providing a REST interface, we'll allow clients to use our events in their preferred programming/scripting languages, while following a clearly-defined and versioned API.As a part of this project, the intern will be tasked with designing the REST interface by coming up with an OpenAPI3.0/Swagger JSON specification, based on the Oracle REST standard, and will implement the API in C code, using our internal REST web-server library, and connecting it to our C event library. The intern will have a large impact on all aspects of the new interface, will learn about industry-standard web service specifications, will get into the nitty-gritty of C multi-threaded code, and will write unit tests in C and our Oratst scripting language

Application Performance monitoring (APM) is a one of the major service offered to Oracleâs customers as part of Oracle Management Cloud (OMC) which is the next generation integrated monitoring, management, and analytics suite of cloud services. As a platform management cloud service, OMC helps customers improve IT stability, prevent application outages, increase DevOps agility and harden security across the entire application and infrastructure portfolio

&Double;Modern processors (Intel, SPARC, Power-PC) have instructions that allow basic operations to be performed on several data elements in parallel. These instructions are called SIMD ( Introduction ) and were created to accelerate multi-media applications. The use of SIMD allows a degree of parallelism where many operands can be processed at once.  Implementing database operations using SIMD has been a subject for active research and commercial implementations have emerged including Oracle exploiting the SSE / AVX instruction set for columnar workloads. Thereâs a sustained trend of increasing â wide vector units and one of the key questions remain âcan existing programs take advantage of these capabilitiesâ. Vectorization potential that exist in computation is typically missed by compilers due to:-â¢ conservative dependency analysis â¢ branches or conditional behavior â¢ Data layouts not allowing contiguous memory accesses for vector processing. This project envisages developing a PIN based instrumentation of Oracle database kernel shared memory data access and computational patterns using industry accepted workloads TPC-C/D/H or Oracle internal workloads generating dependency graphs that can then be used for detailed observation of execution.  These observations can then be used for potentially vectorizable opportunities in the database kernel that include operations that access contiguously located data elements, operations that have better vector instruction counterparts etc. resulting in workload performance gains. Note, this effort doesnât envisage studying Oracle database kernel internal data or index layer algorithms.

Oracle Management Cloud (OMC) is the next generation integrated monitoring, management, and analytics suite of cloud services. As a platform management cloud service, OMC helps customers improve IT stability, prevent application outages, increase DevOps agility and harden security across the entire application and infrastructure portfolio. details.PBDescription: Today it is possible to analyze petabytes of data coming from machine logs, click streams and mobile applications, with open source technologies such as Hadoop.  However acting on this massive amount of data after it has been processed and batched into HDFS or RDBMS is not enough.  The best way to capture the value of incoming data is to react to it the instant it arrives.  If the incoming data is processed in batches, we have already lost time and the value of that data.  Until recently it was considered costly and impractical to act on the data as it arrives.  However massive advancements in two technology areas have made this practically achievable: streaming systems capable of delivering events as fast as they come and data store capable of processing each item as fast as they arrive.Two most popular streaming systems used in the industry today are Apache Storm and Apache Kafka. The engineering team at Twitter developed Storm and LinkedIn developed Kafka. Both these technologies are deployed in our prototype solution today. Number of other streaming systems has emerged over the past few years such as Flume, Millwheel, Avro, Trident, Samza, among others.  Expected outcome of this project is to recommend technology(s) that meet the requirements of Real Time Analytics in terms of Scale, Elasticity, Guaranteed SLA, Data lifetime, Filtering and Simple REST APIs.  Key project deliverable is a technology recommendation backed by solid technical data arrived from running diligent, repeatable and high quality experiments on prototypes designed and implemented by the student intern with assistance from senior engineering staff at Oracle.Success criteria are the quality of data and methodical evaluation to arrive at the technology recommendation, followed by an articulate presentation of findings to senior Execs and Technical staff at Oracle.This project addresses Cloud Services, Big Data and Real Time Processing technology areas.Discipline: Computer science or related Engg DisciplineHaving been involved in a research project and experience interacting with Open Source community will help drive the right outcome. Being an open source contributor is a plus.Domain area this project addresses is Cloud Services with sub areas of Big Data Analytics, Real Time Stream Processing and High Performance Messaging with Fault Tolerance

details.projectTitle: Lightweight iOS and Android invokable SQL Web Service for mobile applications to access Oracle Database in cloud
details.PBDescription: This exploratory project will require defining and implementing a SQL Web Service invokable from iOS and Android devices to securely access Databases in Cloud setups for building rich/native mobile applications. iOS and Android devices will use Objective C and Java methods (respectively) to invoke the new SQL Web Service. The SQL Web Service will talk to a midtier system (Apache/OCI or Node.js/node-oracledb driver)Â  deployed in a cloud to direct the SQL statements to the desired Oracle Database in the cloud and present the results as JSON back to the mobile device. This project will need to define, design and implement the full stack: both on the mobile devices as well as on the mid tier system in the cloud. A sample mobile application on iOS/Android will also need to be built that demonstrates and show cases the power of the new SQL Web Service. At the end of the project, we will get a better understanding of how this new model compares with existing REST based access in terms of richness of functionality, security and performance.Domain areas of the Project: REST service for database access, Data access stack on Android and iOS (Objective-C), service developed using JS (Node-oracledb) or C (OCI).

details.projectTitle: Masking and Securing Sensitive Data in Oracle Database Cloud
details.PBDescription: Many organizations inadvertently breach information security policies when they routinely copy sensitive or regulated production data into non-production environments. As a result, data in non-production environment has increasingly become the target of cyber criminals and can be easily stolen compared to the data in production environment.Just like data breaches in production environments, data breaches in non-production environments have caused millions of dollars to remediate and cause irreparable harm to reputation and brand. Recent such data breach happened at Anthem Data Breach affecting 80 million current and former customers of the health care insurer.Oracle DMS (Data Masking and Subsetting) product is categorized as one of the leaders by Gartner Magic Quadrant to replace sensitive and valuable information in databases with fictions yet realistic values. This product allows business critical application data to be safely shared for non-production purposes such as application development, analytics or training. This also allows organizations to comply with regulatory requirements such as Sarbanes-Oxley, PCI DSS, HIPAA and as well as numerous other security and privacy laws and regulations.Now, we would like to extend the DMS product to discover and mask unstructured data in textual form such as database trace files, alert logs, dump files and other text files. Detailed Project DescriptionCredit card numbers, social security numbers, names, addresses, and phone numbers, are examples of data that require protection as per security and compliance laws around the world. Lot of the data that get generated in Oracle Database Cloud and Big Data environments is unstructured. Our cloud hosting department is wary of handing over trace files and dump files to support teams for further diagnosis and resolution, as the files may contain sensitive customer data. These trace files are useful when diagnosing errors and for debugging purposes. Trace files may also contain sensitive information like client IP addresses, host names, user names. Challenge is to identify sensitive data in unstructured files and mask them consistently so that support teams can effectively debug the problems without getting aware of sensitive data.The project has the following 2 phases : 1) The first phase involves discovery of sensitive data present in trace files and other documents like text files, pdf, excel etc. Machine learning techniques can be leveraged to discover potential sensitive data.2) The second phase involves masking the identified sensitive data. The challenge is to mask the data deterministically across files as per organization security policies.Domain of the project: The project domain spans across several cutting edge technologies like Data Security and Privacy, Unstructured Data Masking, Machine learning, String matching algorithms as well as other Oracle technologies like Outside In and Oracle Database cloud.Students should have the following background: Java programming, Unix Shell scripting, Big Data and Cloud Services, Network and Database Security related courses are plus, Machine learning course is a plusSkill sets expected : Core Java, Shell scripting
details.SKills: Big Data , Cloud Based Applications , Cloud/Web 2.0 Technologies , Core Java , Databases , Java  , Machine learning , unix shell scripting , Interest in research , rapidly learn new technologies , Team spirit

details.PBDescription: Physical and mental health of employees matter a lot in terms of how productive and happy they are in the workplace. If we create mechanisms to monitor physical and mental health through sensor-laden Smart Phones (that most white-collar employees have today) and activity sensors in the workplace then we can provide employees timely insights and action items that will help them be more physically active and give them incentives to take better care of their mental and physical health.The idea is to create a real-time live dashboard of anonymous aggregated physical and mental health of Oracle employees across the world. The live dashboards will be deployed in reception areas across all Oracle offices around the world. We will use gamification techniques and provide timely actionable insights to drive Oracle employees to become more physically and mentally active. We will also simulate the activity sensors in the workplace whether it is a sensor in the chairs to see how long any given employee hasnât moved out of her chair as well as sensors near social hotspots in workplace like coffee machines, cafeteria or conference rooms. The sensors could be used to understand how often an employee moves around, how often he gets coffee/tea, whether she takes timely lunch and how engaged they are with their other colleagues in the workplace.This project will serve three different purpose â a show case for IOT Cloud Service given that the sensors will stream this data to IOTCS,  a way to motivate current Oracle employees to take better care of their health and also a potential valuable offering inside HCM suite for other Oracle corporate customers to bring this in their workplace.Domain areas: Internet of Things (IoT), Android App, iOS App, Actionable Analytics, Human Capital Management Analytics.Specific Institute-based courses/electives in which the students should have background: Android or iOS Development, Machine Learning or Data Mining, Java or equivalent programming language coursework Skill sets expected â Java or C/C++ Projects or any other experience needed on the part of students : Dual Degree students with B.E. (CS) and Mathematics/Physics preferred

It is the only Oracle Applications offering available to customers both on premises and in the cloud. Oracle Fusion Applications were designed, from the ground up using the latest technology advances and incorporating the best practices gathered from Oracle's thousands of customers and is core part of the Software as a Service (SaaS) public cloud solution that Oracle offers. They are 100 percent open-standards-based business applications that set a new standard for the way we innovate, work, and adopt technology. &Double;Customers need the ability to extend or alter the business logic that is available by default. In the On-Premise model, customers can tweak the code as they have complete access to the deployments and achieve their desired business processing. But on the cloud, customers can't modify the code directly. Client extensions for PPM Cloud feature will address that need. As part of this feature, the application should provide a UI using which customer can define their custom business rules. Seeded Business Processes should be able to interpret the custom rules and execute the logic accordingly.Aspects that make this project challenging: 1. Different customers can have different requirements. If we cater to all the anticipated requirements, then the UI will become complex and the implementation of simple use cases will seem unnecessarily complicated for the customers. On the other hand, if we support only a few use cases, not all customer needs can be addressed2. Custom rules support will involve the logic/queries to be dynamic in nature. This can lead to performance issues3. Client extensions should be built as common infrastructure so that various products in PPM can leverage this feature. So the design will have to take into accounts the business use cases of multiple products.Technologies involved:Java, JEE, Oracle ADF (Java based Framework), SQL, PL/SQL, REST Services, Groovy&Double;
Indepth knowledge in Java and JavaScript

details.projectTitle: Design and development of Simulation Software for Satellite Testing
details.PBDescription: Pixxel builds and operates remote sensing earth observation satellites. After the satellites are built, they need to undergo a software-in-loop-simulation to validate them for further tests and launch. The candidate will work on development of such simulation software.Project domainSpace Technology, Computer ScienceSkills: Object Oriented Programming, GUI Development, Version ControlDocumentation and debugging skills, clarity in communicationObject Oriented Programming, Discrete Structures and Algorithms, Computer Architecture (optional)Development of simulation software that will be used to test and validate actual batches of satellites for further hardware testing and launch.â¢ Brush with industry grade software version control and software development practicesâ¢ Study of space and military grade software testing standards and practicesâ¢ Work with an interesting mix of experienced scientists and a young enthusiastic team of space engineers.

details.projectTitle: Design and Development of On-board Image Processing Board for EO Satellites
details.PBDescription: Pixxel builds and operates remote sensing earth observation satellites. The high-quality image data is bulky, which is why with the very low power available on the satellite, it is important to compress it efficiently and in a lossless manner. In this project students will work on a novel image compression algorithm, optimize it for low power FPGAs and design space hardware around it. Furthermore, the board will be designed to provide for machine learning hardware capabilities to host image correction algorithms in the future.Project domain: Space Technology, ElectronicsSkills: Computer Architecture, Experience with FPGAs, Digital Signal Processing, Analog Electronics, Digital Electronics, System Verilog/VHDL, MATLABDocumentation and debugging skills, clarity in communication, hands-on experience with FPGAs and Circuit DesignDigital Signal Processing, Embedded Systems (optional), Analog Electronics, Digital Electronics, Computer Architecture (optional), Power Electronics, Network Programming (optional)â¢ Hands-on experience with design of space grade electronic hardwareâ¢ Get to work with an interesting mix of experienced scientists and a young enthusiastic team of space engineers.â¢ FPGA Programming and fault-tolerant circuit design according to Space/Military standards.

details.projectTitle: Mathematical modeling and analytical validation of the thermal design of a small satellite
details.PBDescription: Pixxel builds and operates remote sensing earth observation satellites. The satellite experiences extreme temperatures and temperature gradients, throughout the orbit. A thermal engineer designs the thermal control systems with space grade insulators, reflectors, heaters, etc. The project shall be aimed to develop a Finite Element Model for the thermal analysis, conducting multiple iterations of the thermal analyses in TMG solver (space thermal module), and aid the thermal engineer in designing the control system. The project shall later also consist of devising a methodology for validating the results of the TMG numerical solver by carrying out simple analytical calculations in the aim of concluding that the solver results are acceptable. Furthermore, the project also involves off-topic tasks such as implementation, procurement, documentation and testing of thermal hardware as applicable.Project Domain : Space Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Thermal control systemsSkills: Heat transfer, Differential equations, FEA formulation (mathematical modeling)Documentation and Communication SkillsHeat Transfer, Numerical methods for heat transfer (optional), Material scienceâ¢ Second hand experience of designing a space systemâs thermal controlâ¢ Hands on experience of numerical modeling and analytical modeling of complex multi DOF systemâ¢ Hands on experience of TMG solver (MAYA HTT, FEMAP/SIMCENTER)â¢ Work with an interesting mix of experienced scientists and a young enthusiastic team of space engineers

CompanyName: Pixxel (Syzygy Space Technologies Pvt. Ltd.) Tech

details.projectTitle: Web application for Automated Defect Identification using Computer Vision in solar panels
details.PBDescription: There are various types of defects in a solar panel. Currently, every panel is checked manually for defects. This defect identification is a tedious process and error prone whendone manually. This project aims at building an assistive technology using Computer Vision to help a human identify those defects accurately and efficiently. It requires knowledge of Image processing, Deep learning and CNNs. This core technology has to be built into a product as a web application on MERN stack. This project is done in  collaboration with another startup which specializes in computer vision and built multiple products in this field1) Come up with a suitable CNN based approach for defect identification from theexisting architectures.2) Select and fine tune the approach to this use case3) Train the model with our data and keep improving until acceptable accuracy isachieved.4) Build a web application around this core technology as per the requirements of theuser.Skills: 1) Good knowledge on Javascript based Front end technologies like React,Node, Django, Mongo (MERN Stack)2) Python2) Image Processing3) Neural Networks4) Open CV

details.projectTitle: Accident prevention using alertness assessment through driver motion detection
details.PBDescription: WHO reports distracted driving as one of the top causes of accidents. Distracted driving happens when drivers are under stress/fatigue, sleep deprived or drunk. Samyojya is attempting to detect instances of distracted driving using a driver's driving pattern model. This involves capturing steering, clutch,  accelerator, gear and braking movements. An AI-engine in combination with 5G infrastructure (V2X protocols) is a comprehensive offering that can save lives. details.PBDescription: Sattva is a social impact strategy consulting and implementation firm. Sattva works closely at the intersection of business and impact, with multiple stakeholders including non-profits, social enterprises, corporations and the social investing ecosystem. We have had an opportunity to work across multiple states in India, countries in Africa and South Asia, on the ground, through our practice in strategic advisory, realising operational outcomes, CSR, knowledge, assessments, and co-creation of sustainable models.Sattva works to realise inclusive development goals across themes in emerging markets including education, skill development and livelihoods, healthcare and sanitation, digital and financial inclusion, energy access and environment, among others. details.projectTitle: Design and Development of an AI-Enabled IoT ecosystem (Hardware + Cloud Intelligence) for the management of Energy Assets
details.PBDescription: Solar rooftops and renewable-powered distributed generation systems are expected to contribute more than any other electricity arrangement which will work in tandem with the extended grid and microgrid network. Before the electricity arrangement can expand by the degree required to deliver universal electricity access in a reliable and clean manner, there are several issues that need to be resolved. Foremost, the focus is on the areas of innovative, fast, precise and affordable monitoring and control of the system. This can give a huge boost to the viability of solar/renewable technology, & have strong positive effects on the drivers of their profitability â revenues, tariffs and costs. Strong monitoring capabilities also give confidence to investors and donors, along with enhancing the customer experience by improving the availability, reliability, and quality of supply and increasing convenience and information about usage. There are several issues like weather, shadowing, panel degradation, poor design, and usage of inferior material, which cause losses up to 50% of the production over the years. We are developing a low-cost, easy-to-install, high-tech monitoring solution that keeps users, owners, & service providers constantly up to date on the solar systemâs performance, and ensures rapid maintenance & a continuous return on the investment. SmartHelio will monitor the solar panels, batteries & loads, run machine learning models for predictive analysis and generate intelligent business insights. It will also act as a smart meter & report solar energy usage to the service provider, which will help them in invoicing and revenue collection from the end-users in case of 3rd party-owned systems.Skills: For the hardware development1. Thorough understanding and hands-on experience in developing IoT devices2. In-depth knowledge of communication technology including GSM device management and programming3. Hands-on experience of developing embedded devices using open source hardware and software tools4. Comfortable with Embedded device programming and testing using ARDUINO and AVRDUDE5. Experience with the complete electronics development process including electronics component sourcing, PCB design, PCB manufacturing, hardware assembly and testingFor the Machine Learning and Cloud Platform Development1. Experience with software development with one or more general programming languages (Java, C/C++, C#, Python, HTML, JavaScript, or Go)2. Experience with architecting, developing, and maintaining cloud platforms with excellent working knowledge of platform as a service (PAAS) and software as a service (SAAS) on AZURE and AWS clouds3. Experience with Server Backend Distributed and Parallel Systems, Full Stack Development (preferably backend), Scalable Enterprise Platforms and Applications, Data Base Management, and Machine Learning4. Advanced working knowledge of application servers (Oracle WebLogic, IBM Websphere etc.), web servers (IIS, Apache) & databases (Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL etc.)5. Excellent presentation and report writing skills6. Passionate for utilizing engineering solutions against climate change in an affordable mannerLearning: 1. Hands on experience on the Technical Product Development2. A good understanding of the IoT & AI Products3. Learn about the sustainability ecosystem and its global dynamics4. Solar Rooftop ecosystem in contemporary Indian & European Market5. Market and business strategies for the IoT products6. An opportunity to work with the researchers from Switzerland (EPFL University) and participate in the global research conclaves7. An opportunity to join our research team, on a full-time basis, in Switzerland

details.projectTitle: Hospital acquired resistant infections: a current global estimate
details.PBDescription: This project seeks to estimate the number of bacterial drug-resistant infections acquired fro hospitals globally by extracting resistant infection rates from previously published iterature. Attempting to characterize this estimate will providegreater insight into the impact of the antimicrobial resistnace situation on hospital acquired infections and discern trends in these drug resistant infections at a global scale. The expectation from the prospective intern is to be able to perform a literature search of published data regarding healthcare associated infections from 2010 to 2019 in countries worldwide. With these studies, interns are expected to code information regarding the proportion of healthcare associated infections that are caused by antimicrobial resistant pathogens into microsoft excel.  Skills: Background in biological sciences/Health Sciences / General SciencesStrong proficiency in Microsoft ExcelPast experience performing literature searches. Communication, Team work, Responsible and ability to work without constant supervisionGain a strong understanding of how to read and extract information from scientific literature regarding AMR and healthcare associated infectionsAcquire strong skills in data cleaning data organization and data entryPrevious collaborators have been included as o-authors on publications in science (as well as other potential high impact journals such as nature)

details.PBDescription: IMT is a function in Compliance & Operational Risk Control (C&ORC) mandated to perform independent testing of controls to provide reasonable assurance that controls are designed and operating effectively. This aims to further strengthen the Operational & Conduct Risk Framework.The project involves supporting IMT team's review of  SOX and CFO relevant controls, with an aim to evaluate whether these controls are designed and operating effectively for a defined period of time, through testing, enabling UBS to satisfy both regulatory and internal requirements. details.PBDescription: Reporting and Analytics skills, IT skills, knowhow of technologies, client management, partnership buildingYour role UBS has clients all over the world. Operations makes sure their deals are settled in the market quickly and accurately. Our people work with all of our businesses, systems, processes and clients â as well as third-party providers â to create a lean and controlled infrastructure. And weâre dedicated to client service excellence: we aim to create value by improving all aspects of front-to-back performance through our analysis and solutions. With such diverse work to do, there is no typical role. But our work commonly includes business analysis, change management, relationship management and risk control. We lead initiatives to improve our products, systems and processes. And we work closely with front-office staff, technology teams and external clients â across business lines and time zones â to increase the effectiveness and efficiency of our global operating platform. We're a fast-paced, collaborative and international team environment. As a part of Operations, your strong communication skills, versatility, commercial acumen and pragmatic approach will be put to good use.Your assignmentThe candidate will be assigned to one of the reporting teams mentioned below.â¢	Project GOA team in Hyderabad and RAW team in Airoli are focused on four specific areas: creating optimal front-to-back flow, moving to paperless processing, becoming much more data-driven, and aiming for 100% 'straight through processing' for everything outside our agreed client touchpoints. The team will focus on redesigning what isn't working well, removing manual and repetitive effort, and getting as much standardized and digitally inbound as possible.â¢	The KYC Operations team assists the client-facing teams to ensure all client KYC records are compliant with regulatory standards, and ensures high quality and timely completion of all client-level due diligence. The team also takes care of end to end operational activities through the periodic renewal process of all clients. The team assists with the drafting and gathering of client documents and verification of client data via publically available and internal sources at a client level prior to final review by a KYC Operations Reviewer and the client-facing team. This research is performed to ensure a clientâs KYC profile is appropriately updated and any discrepancies or issues with the profile escalated to the appropriate lines of business.â¢	Data & Analytics Services team is involved in provision of financial instrument static data, other related reference data (Issuer, ratings, etc.) and pricing data in central data masters, through managed services vendors. Services include sourcing, mastering, maintenance and distribution of data (from various data providers such as Bloomberg, Six FI, IDC etc.) for listed securities. The team acts as the data quality steward for the UBS Group, ensuring complete, accurate and timely Legal Entity and Account data, as well as client Instructions by setting and enforcing the minimum standards to which data can be written and maintained within the master repositories, throughout the life of a counterparty relationshipYour experience and skillsYou have:â	strong analytical and numerical skills combined with a flair of visualizationâ	ability to focus on details and qualityâ	knowledge using MS Excel, VBA skills will be an added advantageâ	understanding of accounting principles as a plusYou are:â	a problem solver able to scope/prioritize along guidelines and willing to take ownershipâ	a team player and strong communicator with interpersonal skills â	flexible and resilient with a positive attitude towards change

Your role Are you a stickler for getting things right? Do you know how to solve problems? We are looking for someone like this who can help us work on some interesting projects, The role is within RAS India which provides management reporting and analytical services to global internal partners. Main team focus is on Group Reporting, Group Treasury, Investment Bank Reporting, Cost Reporting, Service Management and automation through a Joint Venture with the IT team. The Project work will initially entail but will not be limited to Shadowing a senior lead as a mentee to understand Day to Day Business requirements and work expectations within the assigned sub division. This will enable the candidate to get a more practical view of the industry and the skills required to excel. Working on specific work assignments which will broadly fall in the remit of creation and publication of Reports along with Analytical inputs. Analyzing and assisting in automation of existing work stack with usage of advanced data visualization tools. This task will have both consultative as well as execution based aspects. Ideal candidate will have a flair of working with large data sets. Capability to mine information and interpret the same. Excellent logical reasoning. The candidate should have an aspiration of working in Analytics and Data Visualization and Reporting stream post completion of the Degree Programme.Your assignmentThe candidate will be assigned to one of the reporting teams mentioned below.â¢	Group Reporting team provides high quality end to end reporting services to our clients in Group Performance assessment & Analytics and Group Performance Reporting in Group Finance. The team prepares periodic financial statements and other financial reports as per the stakeholder requirement.â¢	Group Treasury team delivers best in class reporting and analysis to support the decision making processes relating to management and optimization of balance sheet, leverage, capital and liquidity & funding resources for UBS group,  business divisions and legal entities. The work provides an opportunity to showcase IT skills in MicroStrategy reporting tool and Python development apart from high end excel reporting.â¢	IB Reporting team provides high quality end to end reporting services to the stakeholders providing detailed insights of the IB business and costs. The work provides an opportunity to showcase IT skills in Tableau, SQL Server based development, MicroStrategy reporting apart from high end excel reporting.â¢	Cost Reporting team provides high quality end to end cost reporting services to the CFOs providing detailed insights of costs analysis. The work provides an opportunity to experience high end reporting systems apart from complex excel reporting and analysis.â¢	RAS Service Management team works as a strong backend support team to ensure integrity and sanctity of reporting and distribution. Operations makes sure their deals are settled in the market quickly and accurately. Our people work with all of our businesses, systems, processes and clients â as well as third-party providers â to create a lean and controlled infrastructure. And weâre dedicated to client service excellence: we aim to create value by improving all aspects of front-to-back performance through our analysis and solutions. With such diverse work to do, there is no typical role. But our work commonly includes business analysis, change management, relationship management and risk control. We lead initiatives to improve our products, systems and processes. And we work closely with front-office staff, technology teams and external clients â across business lines and time zones â to increase the effectiveness and efficiency of our global operating platform. We're a fast-paced, collaborative and international team environment. details.projectTitle: CTR Prediction for Ad Performance Evaluation
details.PBDescription: Click-through rate is defined as the probability of ad click from a specific user on a displayed ad impression. In order to maximize revenue and user satisfaction, online advertising platforms must predict the expected user behaviour for each ad impression and maximize the expectation that users will click it. Research and analysis is to be conducted to develop a model for CTR prediction task that fits in the B2B scenario.Project Domain: Data ScienceSkill Set Required: Machine learning, Deep learning, Python, SQL, Apache sparkOther Soft Skills: good written and verbal communication; intrinsically motivated and independentAny Specific Course that student should have taken: Machine Learning/Data MiningOther Requirement: Familiarity with E-commerce domain and advertisingExpected Outcome: â¢Reading and understanding multiple research papersâ¢Integrating theory and practiceâ¢Domain specific modellingâ¢Handling big data

details.PBDescription: The Goal:The aim of the analytics vertical in the Corporate Strategy team at Viacom18 is to enable the company make informed business decisions by performing analytics on proprietary data. The team does so by regularly generating insights and communicating them to the business stakeholders and using the insights to automate and optimize the business processes. This involves exploring data to find new patterns and insights, explaining through data why a certain result occurred, developing business rules and processes to make quick decisions and forecasting future results. The Opportunity:In this project, the intern will help the team to improve the sales strategy of the organization by performing exploratory analytics on the advertising clients. The following analytics will be performed during the project â â¢	Segment the clients across business units into qualitative and quantitative buckets â¢	Analyze the consumption pattern and behavior of the clients in different segmentsâ¢	Identify missed opportunities by comparing to the clients of the competitorsâ¢	Identify white gaps that the sales teams should pursueâ¢	Identify cross selling and up selling opportunities and present to the business stakeholdersIn addition, the intern will also help to enrich the data available for the clients by identifying newer data sources that can be purchased, identifying strategic partners that can provide additional information about clients or by suggesting processes to collect and store additional data regarding the advertisersFinally, the intern will help to identify the areas to improve the deal making and ad scheduling process This project will provide a holistic understanding of key sales KPIs and how the sales organization functions through interactions with stakeholders in the corporate strategy team and the senior leadershipThe Learning:During this project you will learn and sharpen the following skills working alongside the best of the professionals with great credentials:1.	Problem solving2.	Analytical capabilities3.	Business understanding4.	Effective communication5.	Stakeholder Management6.	Project Management

The Goal:The aim of the analytics vertical in the Corporate Strategy team at Viacom18 is to enable the company make informed business decisions by performing analytics on proprietary data. The team does so by regularly generating insights and communicating them to the business stakeholders and using the insights to automate and optimize the business processes. This involves exploring data to find new patterns and insights, explaining through data why a certain result occurred, developing business rules and processes to make quick decisions and forecasting future results. The Opportunity:In this project, the intern will help the team to generate analytical solutions by developing advanced analytics models. The following activities will be performed during the project â â¢	Prepare and analyze the data for model developmentâ¢	Assist in model development and validationâ¢	Develop validation processes to ensure the model output is accurateâ¢	Develop automated processes to measure and quantify the impact of the modelâ¢	Develop reports and dashboards to communicate the model output to the stakeholdersIn addition, the intern will also help to identify the new analytics use cases and analytics framework to solve these use cases. The intern will also help to enrich the data available within the organization by collecting data from newer data sources This project will provide a holistic understanding of development of analytics solutions through interactions with stakeholders in the corporate strategy team and the senior leadershipThe Learning:During this project you will learn and sharpen the following skills working alongside the best of the professionals with great credentials:1.	Problem solving2.	Advanced Analytical capabilities3.	Business understanding4.	Effective communication5.	Stakeholder Management6.	Project Management

details.PBDescription: Project - 1            (a)            Project description in terms of broad phases: Building OEM for APM solution using WF libraries for Observability platform both on premise and Cloud             (b)          Identify domain area and various sub areas of the Project: Monitoring and management service that provides data and actionable insights across multicloud (VMC, Azure, AWS, GCP)Project - 2 Description: NIMBUS VMC console will be the centralized interface which will integrate common operation across the boardAdmission ControlWith initial usage of VMCOnNimbus locally, we are anticipating huge demand when we onboard the service to stage or production skyscraper service. The current NIMBUS quota management will not be sufficient to distribute NIMBUS resources fairly to teams. We need a service which keep track of the resources, and do the admission control as per the administratorâs settings for a team or a particular user. Administrator can take decision as per the current VMC delivery priority and set quota to groups. Users will be restricted if they are going beyond quota setting, this will reduce the failures and keep system always healthy and reliable.Usage Statistics:Usage statistics will help administrator to keep track of teamâs usage and adjust resource allocation. This will help administrator to estimate of NIMBUS resourcesIndividual users can get to know their current and past usage statistics to recommend administrator for quota adjustments. Estimates for deployment will make users more confident to get a SDDC deployed on the NIMBUS VMC platform.DiagnosticsThis will be one stop interface to run diagnostics for a SDDC to know any anomalies. This will reduce the triaging time for any of subject matter experts. Diagnostics will be intelligent to run on any of the SDDC on VMC NIMBUS 2.o to give a initial glance of problems.SharingUsers can share SDDC for a specific build or configuration e.g MultiAZ with a build, a upgraded SDDC etc. System will search for alive SDDC with a specific configuration search criteria and can request the SDDC owner. Owner should able to share the SDDC in one click to a user. This will reduce the time for users in search of seeing a configuration or do a non-destructive operation.Health monitoring:This will give everyone a one stop interface which aggregates different source of health information of systems and give users a confidence. This will reduce the effort of administrator to reach out to users for any infrastructure issues, this will be a self-service. Administrator can even put alerts on the console for general purpose. Users can subscribe/un-subscribe for any specific alerts like usage statistics, current estimation etc periodically.  Runbooks and How-toGive a search with keywords to get a specific documents on a runbook or how-to. This will search a specific confluence namespace to get the pinpointed details.â¢	Identify domain area and various sub areas of the Project:Domain â Cloud Platformo	System Virtualizationo	SaaS Health monitoringo	AWS serviceso	Springboot Project - 3 (a)	Project description in terms of broad phases: The overall project is VMC i.e VMWare on AWS cloud. VMC is a cloud platform organization within VMWare. VMC opens up VMWare customers to run their applications on the AWS cloud with the tools and software that are very familiar with.  VMC is a very recent initiative within VMWare (2 year old) and operating as a startup driving the CEO vision of providing VMWare offering on âany cloudâ.  Many large enterprises around the world (Freddie Mac, Vanguard, etc) are customers of the offering. More details are available at https://cloud.vmware.com/vmc-aws(b)	Identify domain area and various sub areas of the Project:a.	Opportunity is with the Developer Productivity team of the VMC. This is a core engineering team within VMC. The team is solely responsible for architecture, design and implementation of the scalable developer productivity solutions.  The team enables the entire VMC service engineering teams to build, test, deploy and manage their applications.b.	The team leverages the latest technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker, ConcourseCI, GitOps, Terraform, AWS Lambda and other best of breed tools to build their software. Project - 4Virtual Cluster MemoryThis project is all about realizing disaggregated memory support in our ESX kernel. This would involve development of special purpose memory management algorithms for managing the virtual memory management and the swap-sub-systems in ESX kernel.  This work will mostly be on C and exposure to system programming would definitely be a plus. Project -5 MitosisThis project is all about development of NUMA optimization algorithms for our NUMA memory management subsystem for our kernel.  This work will mostly be on C and exposure to system programming would definitely be a plus.
